alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 29 at 8:09PM PDT until March 30 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible above 5000 feet with locally 12 to 18 inches on higher peaks. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph at times. * WHERE...Riverside County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
